main.name: Vivek Malhan
main.description: Full Stack Developer by Day, Pentester,Coffee Coder and RJ by night
main.bio: My name is Vivek, I'm a Full Stack Developer. Currently I'm working at College community known as 'Great developers' developing, maintaining and testing everything that works on the college server. Hey don't just presume me as another computer geek. I am also a part time RJ at a regional radio station

testimonials.text: To be honest I and Vivek have been working in GD for quite a while now, No matter what the situation this guy never gives up, always is eager to find a solution no matter what.
Quick and keen learner, Helpful and informative.
Always lends a helping hand, Eager to learn and is a quick learn with diverse knowledge.
